name: Symphony Line VR
description:
Shake your head along to the melody in 360 VR space!
Here comes the free hands-on musical game in Virtual Space!
The whole-new experience of leading an orchestra is here!

◆Music Game x VR
"Symphony Line" is a music game which is compatible with a VR Viewer.
With a VR Viewer, you can control a conductor's baton by the movement of your head.
By swinging the baton along to the music, beautiful curves and objects appear in the 360 space.

◆Play the classical masterpieces
Symphony Line contains many classical masterpieces.
Enjoy playing the classics such as "Salut d'amour", " Pomp and Circumstance", and "Symphony No.5 c-minor(Beethoven)".

◆The judging system which grades the play.
Your conduct will be judged from the various perspectives.
Get 100 scores and you are one of the maestros!

◆Play without any VR viewer.
You can play the game either you have a VR viewer or not.
Shake your smartphone and become a great conductor!

***【About the VR Cardboard】***
VR headset for smartphones such as Hacosco or Google Cardboard is needed to play this game.
※ “Hacosco” is a product of Hacosco Inc.
※ Google Cardboard is a product of Google.

***【Price】***
Free

*** About the Startup screen ***
If the startup screen with cardboard tutorial doesn’t disappear, unlock the Portrait Orientation Mode of your iPhone and rotate the device once or twice.
